TableSpec.Name: USR_UMHS_REFERRAL
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about MIMED Referral records
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

ForeignKeyField.Name: UMHSID
ForeignKeyField.Description: Foreign key to the MIMED Data table

ForeignKeyField.Name: REFERRERID
ForeignKeyField.Description: Foreign key to the referrer's constituent record.

BooleanField.Name: FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED
BooleanField.Description: Follow-up Completed represents the completion of the follow-up with this the referral

EnumField.Name: FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE
EnumField.Description: Follow-up Status represents the success or failure status of the follow-up
